name: Combislow® 18-10-18 +2+15 + 2MgO + 15 SO₃
description: Combislow® 18-10-18 +2+15 + 2MgO + 15 SO₃ is a product that combines, in a single formulation, the ready availability of nutrients, deriving from the use of pure raw materials and a consistent nitrogen reserve deriving from the use of methylenurea. The slow-release nitrogen allows to accompany the development of crops in synchrony with the root activity.
